text: (And they say) Abu Jahl and his host, al-Nadr and his host, and Umayyah Ibn Khalaf and his host say: (What aileth this messenger (of Allah) that he eateth food) like we do (and walketh in the markets) and goes to the markets and walks there as we do? (Why is not an angel sent down unto him, to be a warner with him) to help and inform him of the evil things which are planned against him.
